table.title: VLAN Information by Host
table.searchString: index=extnet sourcetype=vlan | rex max_match=0 "(?<vlanName>\w+)\s+(?<vlanID>\d+)\s+((?<vlanProtAddr>\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+)\s+(?<vlanSubMask>\/\d+)|\s+)\s+(?<vlanFlags>(\-|\w)+)\s+(?<vlanProto>\w+)\s+(?<vlanPorts>\d+\s\/\d+)\s+(?<vlanVirRouter>\S+)\s+" | dedup host | table host,vlanName,vlanID,vlanProtAddr,vlanSubMask,vlanFlags,vlanProto,vlanPorts,vlanVirRouter | rename host as "Host" vlanName as "VLAN Name" vlanID as "ID" vlanProtAddr as "Protocol Address" vlanSubMask as "Submask" vlanFlags as "Flags" vlanProto as "Protocol" vlanPorts as "Active/Total Ports" vlanVirRouter as "Virtual Router"
